printer_img.description: the printer image/logo which going to bind

printer_name.description: the printer default name which going to bind

printer_status.description: the status of the printer which going to bind

input_box.description: the text filed to set the new printer name

change_name_tips.description: the tips info when click the change printer name

locator.xpath: //android.view.View[@text='可点击下列按钮，快速指定打印机名称']

name_options_home.description: change name default options: home printer

name_options_office.description: change name default options: office printer

name_options_friend.description: change name default options: friend printer

name_options_public.description: change name default options: public printer

printer_model_name.description: the printer model name which going to bind

group_list.description: the list for all exist group

remove_group_name.description: the list for all exist group

remove_group_button.description: the list for all exist group

which_group.description: which group you want to select

add_group.description: the button used to add a new group option

add_group_complete.description: the complete button to confirm the group name

set_default_printer.description: the check box, if true, set the printer as default

printer_reset_string.description: The printer reset strings '打印机已重置，请扫描新的打印机二维码绑定。如何绑定?' on the page

locator.partial_text@android.view.View: 打印机已重置，请扫描新的打印机二维码绑定。如何绑定

qr_code_error_message.description: The error message '二维码错误' on binding printer page

invalid_character_prompt_message.description: The error message '50个字符以内，可输入中文，字母，数字，中划线，空格' on binding printer page

locator.partial_text@android.view.View: 50个字符以内，可输入中文，字母，数字，中划线，空格

long_printer_name_prompt_message.description: The error message '1-5个字符，可输入中文，字母，数字，中划线，空格' on binding printer page

locator.partial_text@android.view.View: 1-5个字符，可输入中文，字母，数字，中划线，空格

same_name_prompt_message.description: The error message '相同名称不能重复使用' when trying to add the same group on binding printer page

locator.text@android.view.View: 相同名称不能重复使用

eight_group_limit_prompt_message.description: The error message '只能有8个分组' when trying to add more than 8 groups on binding printer page

kind_remind_message.description: The error message '温馨提示(您当前不是管理员)' when user is not an admin/owner of the printer

locator.partial_text@android.view.View: 温馨提示(您当前不是管理员)

reset_printer_web_service_url.description: The error message '重置打印机Web服务' when user is not an admin/owner of the printer
